attributes.additional_details:
Police are not bothering with the report and theft of converters.
This needs to Urgently change.
It is costing people utter misery.
Some thing URGENTLY needs to be done
attributes.background: Act on passing Laws on tighter control for scrap metal dealers buying cut off catalytic converters.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575859
